Param.LuaScript: result=not(IsStealthed())

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(6770) --[[ Sap ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then if IsStealthed() then result=true end end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(921) --[[ Pick Pocket ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then if IsStealthed() then result=true end end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(36554) --[[ Shadowstep ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) and (UnitHealth("target")>1) then local ssname="" if IsStealthed() then ssname=GetSpellInfo(703) --[[ Garrote ]] else ssname=GetSpellInfo(1766) --[[ Kick ]] end result=(IsSpellInRange(ssname,"target")==1) if result then StartAttack("target") CastSpellByName(ssname,"target") end end

if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") then if not IsStealthed() then local EvasionNeeded="worldboss,rareelite,elite,rare" local Mana=0; local healthPercent=(UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") * 100) result=(((UnitPowerType("target")~=Mana) and (healthPercent < 50)) and ((EvasionNeeded:find(UnitClassification("target"))~=nil) or (UnitLevel("target")>=UnitLevel("player")) or (UnitLevel("target")==-1))) or (healthPercent < 30) end; end
local spellname=GetSpellInfo(79140) --[[ Vendetta ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then result=true end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(1943) --[[ Rupture ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then if not IsStealthed() then result=true end end;
local spellname=GetSpellInfo(222062) --[[ Kingsbane ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then result=true end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(32645) --[[ Envenom ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) and (UnitPower("player",3) > 75) then result=true end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(1833) --[[ Cheap Shot ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then --[[ Stealth, Shadow Dance or Subterfuge ]] if IsStealthed() or (UnitBuff("player",GetSpellInfo(185313))~=nil) or (UnitBuff("player",GetSpellInfo(108208))~=nil) then result=true end end
local spellname=GetSpellInfo(408) --[[ Kidney Shot ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then result=true end
local spellname=GetSpellInfo(1766) --[[ Kick ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) then result=true end;

local spellname=GetSpellInfo(36554) --[[ Shadowstep ]] if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and (IsSpellInRange(spellname,"target")==1) and (UnitHealth("target")>1) then if ((UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") * 100) < 100) or (UnitName("player")==UnitName("targettarget")) or (not UnitInParty("player")) then result=true if IsStealthed() or (UnitBuff("player",GetSpellInfo(185313))~=nil) or (UnitBuff("player",GetSpellInfo(108208))~=nil) then local ssname=GetSpellInfo(185438) --[[ Shadowstrike ]] if IsSpellInRange(ssname,"target")==1 then result=false end else local ssname=GetSpellInfo(53) --[[ Backstab ]] if IsSpellInRange(ssname,"target")==1 then result=false end end end end

local function UseContainerItemByIDList(search) --[[ needed below ]] local found=nil; for bag = 0,4 do for slot = 1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag) do local itemLink = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot) if itemLink then local _, _, Color, Ltype, Id, Enchant, Gem1, Gem2, Gem3, Gem4, Suffix, Unique, LinkLvl, Name = string.find(itemLink,"|?c?f?f?(%x*)|?H?([^:]*):?(%d+):?(%d*):?(%d*):?(%d*):?(%d*):?(%d*):?(%-?%d*):?(%-?%d*):?(%d*):?(%d*):?(%-?%d*)|?h?%[?([^%[%]]*)%]?|?h?|?r?") if Id then search=','..search..','; if (search:find(","..Id..",")) then if (GetContainerItemCooldown(bag,slot)==0) then UseContainerItem(bag,slot) found=1; end end; end end end end return found; end
if (GetUnitSpeed("player") == 0) and not (UnitCastingInfo("player")) and not (UnitChannelInfo("player")) and not (UnitAffectingCombat("player")) and not (IsFlying()) and not (IsFalling()) and not (UnitIsAFK("player")) then if not IsStealthed() then --[[ Add your Mob-IDs to the list ]] local archlist="114141,114143,114145,114147,114149,114151,114153,114155,114157,114159,114161,114163,114165,114167,114169,114171,114173,114175,114177,114179,114181,114183,114185,114187,114189,114190,114191,114192,114193,114194,114195,114196,114197,114198,114199,114200,114201,114202,114203,114204,114205,114206,114207,79896,79897,79898,79899,79900,79901,79902,79903,79904,79905,79908,79909,79910,79911,79912,79913,79914,79915,79916,79917,95375,95376,95377,95378,95379,95380,95381,95382" local fishlist="112633,141975,139655,139656,139657,139658,139659,139660,139661,139662,139663,139665,139666,133710,133711,133712,133713,133714,133715,133716,133719,133720" local artefact="133703,138781,138782,138783,138839,138885,139508,139608,139615,139617,139653,140310,141023,141705,141890,141930,141689,141690,141702,141922,141934,142054" --[[ ]] if (UseContainerItemByIDList(archlist..","..fishlist..","..artefact)) then --[[ do not use boxes/bags and similar ]] result=true; end end; end
